# Module: tf.contrib.gan.eval.eval_utils



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/gan/python/eval/python/eval_utils.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.6/tensorflow/contrib/gan/python/eval/python/eval_utils.py).

Utility file for visualizing generated images.

## Functions

[`image_grid(...)`](../../../../tf/contrib/gan/eval/image_grid): Arrange a minibatch of images into a grid to form a single image.

[`image_reshaper(...)`](../../../../tf/contrib/gan/eval/image_reshaper): A reshaped summary image.
